subject: Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: When Pokey Chatman resigned last March as L.S.U.’s coach, many wondered whether the fallout would undermine one of the nation’s top programs. So far, the answer appears to be no.
snippet: When Pokey Chatman resigned last March as L.S.U.’s coach, many wondered whether the fallout would undermine one of the nation’s top programs. So far, the answer appears to be no.
